reviews.review: CS:GO is a classic. The shooting is flashy, the community is strong which means getting into matches is fast. There are plenty of community game modes and servers if you get bored of the game. Competitive is interesting and tense, and public lobbies have some funny people. A few gripes I have with the game include hacking, this isn't as much a game issue as a community issue, but hackers are just lame and lessen the experience overall. The cosmetics are cool but getting keys for the boxes is pretty expensive. Personally I do enjoy public lobbies over competitive ones because I have high blood pressure, and those tense moments you get with the competitive matches make my heart rate skyrocket, which my doctor does not recommend. Overall, probably the best multiplayer fps out there with solid mechanics and a lot of variety. 4/5
